sect1.title: Migrating from Previous Versions
sect1.para: This chapter documents primarily backwards compatibility breaks made in Zend_Filter, and should serve to aid in migration from previous versions.

sect2.title: Migrating from versions prior to 1.9
sect2.para: Prior to the 1.9 release, Zend_Filter allowed the usage of the static get() method. As with release 1.9 this method has been renamed to filterStatic() to be more descriptive. The old get() method is marked as depreciated.
